name: AIDEN
description: The story of AIDEN which uses the most basic features of an enclosed area in the most simple way.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any 2 GB moderate display card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported Additional Notes: It has not been tested on any device, it does not mean it can work on any system!
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Any processor, 32-bit available Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Any 2 GB moderate video card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Supported Additional Notes: It has not been tested on any device, it does not mean it can work on any system!
